Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.client

Interface ISegmentedAsset

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAsset, IIdentifier, Parcelable
    public interface ISegmentedAsset
extends IAsset
    Interface to segmented assets in Virtuoso. A segmented asset consists of one or more segments. Virtuoso treats this collection of segments as an atomic unit when downloading. Developers can retrieve an instance by calling createSegmentedAsset() or one of its sibling methods in IAssetManager.
    See Also:
    IAssetManager

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface android.os.Parcelable

    • Method Detail

      • addSegments

        int addSegments​(List<String> aSegmentUrls)
        Add a list of segments to this asset. Virtuoso will maintain the order of the segments. The passed-in list must contain the absolute URL of each segment to be downloaded.
        Parameters:
        aSegmentUrls - List of URLs comprising the segments
        Returns:
        Number of segments successfully added

      • addSegments

        int addSegments​(Context context,
                List<String> aSegmentUrls)
        Add a list of segments to this asset, specifying the context to be used. Virtuoso will maintain the order of the segments. The passed-in list must contain the absolute URL of each segment to be downloaded.
        Parameters:
        aSegmentUrls - List of URLs comprising the segments
        context - Context to be used for acquiring the content provider client
        Returns:
        Number of segments successfully added

        Current list of all segments associated with this asset
        Returns:
        List of segments
        See Also:
        ISegment

        Returns:
        List of segments

        ISegment

      • getDownloadSegments

        List<ISegment> getDownloadSegments​(Context context)
        Current list of segments used for a fully downloaded asset, including ancilliary files but not including segments which are for fastplay only
        Parameters:
        context - Context to use when accessing the client content provider
        Returns:
        List of segments
        See Also:

      • getLocalBaseDir

        String getLocalBaseDir()

        Returns:
        Path of the segmented asset directory

        Number of segments already downloaded
        Returns:
        Number of segments already downloaded

      • getExpectedSize

        double getExpectedSize()
        Expected total size of this asset This is an estimated sum of the sizes of all segments belonging to this asset. This value will change as Virtuoso downloads additional segments and refines its estimate of the total size.
        Specified by:
        getExpectedSize in interface IAsset
        Returns:
        The expected total size of the asset, in bytes

      • getFastplayPlaybackURL

        URL getFastplayPlaybackURL()
                    throws MalformedURLException
        URL for a fastplay manifest suitable for sending to the player. The returned playback URL will point at the VirtuosoClientHTTPService, which will deliver the modified manifest and the initial video segments. The service must be running for the player to use it.
        To ensure the service is running, be sure to include the service and metadata declarations in the Android Manifest: 
         
 <meta-data android:name="com.penthera.virtuososdk.clienthttpservice.enabled" android:value="true" />

 <service android:name="com.penthera.virtuososdk.service.VirtuosoClientHTTPService"
            android:label="VirtuosoClientHTTPService"
            android:exported="false"
            android:process=":vservice" >
    <intent-filter>
        <action android:name="virtuoso.intent.action.START_VIRTUOSO_CLIENT_HTTP_SERVICE" />
    </intent-filter>
 </service>
        Returns:
        URL of the fastplay playback manifest, or null if outside of the availability window, the asset does not support fastplay or is not ready to play.
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - If the generated url cannot be parsed by URL

        Returns:

      • updateSegment

        void updateSegment​(Context context,
                   ISegment segment)
        Persists this segment data to disk The only fields updated through this call are the custom header fields and the remote URL.
        Parameters:
        context - Context to use for persisting the data to internal database
        segment - Segment to be updated

        Whether all the licenses have been downloaded and stored for the asset

        Returns:

      • manualDrmRefresh

        void manualDrmRefresh()
        Manually triggers download of updated DRM associated with this asset Success or failure of the DRM download will be reported by Observers.IEngineObserver

      • getAncillaryFiles

        List<AncillaryFile> getAncillaryFiles​(Context context)
        Get the ancillary files associated with this asset.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to use for querying the content resolver for ancillary files
        Returns:
        List of AncillaryFile files associated with this asset, or null if no files

      • getAncillaryFilesForTag

        List<AncillaryFile> getAncillaryFilesForTag​(Context context,
                                            String tag)
        Get the ancillary files associated with this asset that have a specific tag.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to use for querying the content resolver for ancillary files
        tag - string tag value to filter returned list of ancillary files
        Returns:
        List of AncillaryFile files associated with this asset that have the specified tag, or null if no files
